name: One -> Way
description:
Warning: This game is in very early development. Pretty much everything is liable to change.

One -> Way is a simple game about building roads. Connect your road to all of the buildings before your road or the buildings fall off the screen!

As most UI Elements are not yet complete, here are the controls:
(All controller controls assume you're using an xbox controller. Translate as necessary)

WASD / D-PAD - Moves your current road tile. Hold down to automove in that direction.

SHIFT / 'X' on Controller - Speed up automove.

SPACE / 'A' on Controller - Pause/Unpause Game

ESC - Restart Game
